MdePkg/Include/Ppi/BootInRecoveryMode.h File Reference


Defines

#define EFI_PEI_BOOT_IN_RECOVERY_MODE_PPI

Variables

EFI_GUID gEfiPeiBootInRecoveryModePpiGuid

Detailed Description

This PPI is installed by the platform PEIM to designate that a recovery boot is in progress.

Revision Reference:
This PPI is introduced in PI Version 1.0.
